service: managestudent-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.9
  region: us-east-1
  stage: dev
  environment:
    DATABASE_URL: ${env:POSTGRES_URI} # Lấy từ biến môi trường

functions:
  app:
    handler: main.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true

plugins:
  - requirements
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin

custom:
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: non-linux
